title: Create Collections in Milvus
description: Creates collections with specified parameters in Milvus

id.title: Job ID
id.description: The ID for this job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_)

sparkConfig.title: Additional parameters
sparkConfig.description: Provide additional key/value pairs to be injected into the training JSON map at runtime. Values will be inserted as-is, so use " to surround string values

writeOptions.title: Write Options
writeOptions.description: Options used when writing output to Solr or other sources

readOptions.title: Read Options
readOptions.description: Options used when reading input from Solr or other sources.

collections-list.title: Collections
collections-list.description: List of the collections that should be created with corresponding params.

milvusCollectionName.title: Collection Name
milvusCollectionName.description: Name of the collection to create in Milvus

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: Dimension size of vectors to be stored in the collection

indexFileSize.title: Index File Size
indexFileSize.description: Files larger than this will trigger index building for raw data files

metric.title: Metric
metric.description: Metric which should be used for vectors similarity

allow-recreate.title: Override collections
allow-recreate.description: If checked and there are existing collections with the same names, they will be dropped and recreated. If unchecked, the exception is thrown in such situation.
